Articles.Content:
So one day I found myself wondering about savegames and how people used them.

Do you make backups of savegames?

If you have a game with limited savegame slots, do you often want more slots?

Do you share savegames with friends?

So I game on multiple PCs and I was wondering how do you guys deal with save games and such.

Do you guys game on multiple PCs?

Do you use one savegame on those Pcs?

I don't understand it, but I'll try it.

Do I make a backup? Sometimes, before an update or major thing.

Limited Savegame slots? What?

Do I share savegames with friends? Yes.

I don't have multiple PCS. Why would I? ;P

Backup saves: Not generally.

Limited Saves: Hardly ever see them on the PC, maybe in badly ported games. If it was a huge issue to me, I'd dig through the filesystem and move saves around as needed.

Shared saves: No.

Multiple PC's: Yes, but separate saves on each. Generally there are few games that I'd have installed on more than one PC simultaneously.
